creator: vlsergey@gmail.com
text:
Considering the patch at Wed Nov 28 07:19:46 2012 UTC (3 months, 1 week ago) by mturk
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tomcat/native/tags/TOMCAT_NATIVE_1_1_27/native/src/poll.c?r1=1413136&r2=1414560&diff_format=h

Patch was applied only to branch and not in trunk yet. But it has a bug regarding Poll.remove() optimization. In case when socket is not linked to any pollset, the result of remove() call should be APR_NOTFOUND, not APR_SUCCESS in lines 262-263.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: This was fixed in r1525525 and was included in 1.1.29 onwards.
